caption.p: Multivariate linear regression (MLR) analysis of simulated summer water temperatures. Bars show partial regression coefficients b 1 and b 2 associated with air temperature and discharge, respectively. Triangles represent explained variance in %. p-values for coefficient b 1 and b 2 are provided in Supplementary TableÂ S10. All time series are detrended prior to MLR analysis. Map generated using ESRI ArcMap 10.5.1 ( http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap/).
